defs: = ಝಳಪಿಸು.
a cluster, a bunch, a collection of hairs, threads, feathers, flowers, grass etc. held or fastened together at one end.
= ಝಳಕ2.
= ಝಳಪಿಸು.
to render (someone or something) useless, strengthless, vigourless.
an ornament for the ankles that makes a jingling sound.
the sound made by the wind moving at a very high speed.
a hollow, round hemisphere or flat plate of brass or bronze that produces a heavy sound when struck, used by mendicants or in places of worship; a brass cymbal.
a piece of cloth bearing a design, motto, slogan, etc., attached to a staff; a banner; a flag.
(fig.) a brief or temporary stay.
(fig.) to stay at another's place for considerable period.
= ಝಾಂಡಹೂಡು.
= ಝಾಂಡಹೂಡು.
(dial.) the lid of a kitchen utensil.
a low, woody plant with several permanent stems instead of a single trunk; a bush; a shrub.
a place shaded by vines on a latticework; a bower; an arbour.
= ಝಾಡಣೆ.
= ಝಾಟಲಿ.
the plant Stereospermum suaveolens (= Bignonia suaveolens) of Bignoniaceae family.
its flower; trumpet flower.
a shaking vehemently.
the act of throwing, ousting, forcing or driving out.
frequent and loose moving of bowels.
a person employed to remove dirt, filth, refuse, etc. from streets or to clean toilets; a scavenger.
the caste of such persons.
a large number of persons or things gathered, come in, brought together; a multitude; a crowd.
a sufficient or more than sufficient, supply; plentifulness; abundance.
a special quality, feature, point, characteristic, etc. specialty.
a porcelain jar used as a kitchenware.
a thick blanket.
a rough, thick cloth.
to spread (oneself) widely and densely.
the state of being spread widely and densely.
to sweep with or as with a broom; to broom.
to shake (something) vehemently as to get rid of dust.
to eliminate or discard; to get rid (of).
to act with force or vehemently.
to rebuke, reprimand or abuse; to reprove.
to come forth or out; to emerge.
to explode, blast violently.
to be discharged (from the bowels, loosely and frequently).
(rain) to pour heavily.
to beat, smash; to strike; to hit.
to behave rudely or without courtesy.
a low, woody plant with several permanent stems instead of a single trunk; a bush; a shrub.
= ಝಾಡಮಾಲಿ.
a clearing of one's dues, loan etc. payable to another.
the act, fact or an instance of using up or expending completely.
an official record of population, number of houses, agricultural ploughs, livestock, etc. of a village.
to tell, convey frankly with certainty.
the small tree (or shrub) Tamarix troupii (= T. indica, T. gallica) of Tamariacaceae family, with slender branches and feathery flower clusters; tamarisk.
the space, amount or degree to which a thing extends; extent.
a small, flat piece of stone, used in games by children.
a relatively longer step or stride.
the act of leaping; a jumping.
a unit of linear measure, equal to the length of a relatively longer step or stride of a person (this unit is subjective and not a standard one).
the pushing of a marble, in a children's play, with the back of the palm with fingers bent.
a long stride or step, in walking.
= ಝಾಪಕ.
a period of three hours.
a going round the town at regular intervals by guards, police.
the place or station of a group of city guards, policemen, etc; an outpost.
a long, almost cylindrical, percussion instrument that has leather membrane on both sides, which is very popular in Karnāṭaka system of music.
(mus.) a mode of beating time.
a porous, metal ladle, used for frying food items in oil.
a term used to encourage, applaud etc.; 'well-done', 'bravo'.
= ಝಾಲರಿ.
a decorative covering fastened above a bed, throne, framework sheltering an area, etc.
any arrangement or fabric of parallel wires, threads, etc. crossed at regular intervals by others fastened to them so as to leave open spaces; meshwork; network.
a porous, metal ladle, used for frying food items in oil.
a pair of circular, slightly concave brass plates striking together which gives a loud sound.
= ಝಾಮ.
= ಝಾಪಕ.
the purple nail dye plant Barleria cristata of Acanthaceae family.
= ಝಿಲ್ಲಿಕೆ.
the humming sound of bees.
a kind of bee that makes continuous jarring sound.
= ಝಿಲ್ಲಿಕೆ.
= ಝಿಲ್ಲಿಕೆ.
a low, woody plant with several permanent stems instead of a single trunk; a bush; a shrub.
a tuft of hair, threads, etc.
a kind of agreeably pungent, liquid food made using the flour of the dried dhal of Cicer arietinum (chicken pea), to be mixed with rice.
an ear-ring with a hanging.
a kind of decorative glass lamp in the shape of a bunch of flowers.
to move quickly to and fro as from cold, fear etc.; to shake with a tremulous motion; to tremble.
to beat, pulsate, vibrate; to throb.
the tendency or character in human to undertake a risky, hazardous or adventurous action.
the act of drawing the smoke deep into the lungs from a cigarette, bīḍi, cigar, etc.
immediately; suddenly; at once.
hazy appearance; obscurity.
brilliance; lustre.
2.a single swing or movement in one direction of an oscillating body.
a decorative cloth used to cover the back and sides of a horse, elephant, etc.
an ancient language belonging to the Indo-European languages family.
(a bee) to make a continuous humming sound; to hum.
to make a low, continuous, murmuring sound like that of a bee; to hum.
to speak in a harsh language.
to produce a heavy sound by pulling and releasing suddenly the string of a bow.
the humming sound of bees.
the thunder-like sound produced by pulling and releasing suddenly the string of a bow.
to produce resonant sound as by playing a stringed instrument.
to become temporarily unconscious.
to move from back to forth, side to side unsteadily.
to be attracted, enchanted, fascinated.
to cause to move frequently to and from; to cause to vibrate; to shake (a thing).
to fill (oneself) in (something) tightly; to be tightly packed in.
to quiver, shiver from fear, cold, etc.; to tremble.
to prevent (something) from happening; to avoid (a difficult or dangerous situation).
temporary loss of one's bodily awareness, resulting from rapture, melody, tiredness, etc.; the state of being stupefied.
a state in which the mind and senses are dulled for want of sleep; sleepiness; drowsiness.
name of a petty deity.
to become numbed physically; to be benumbed.
= ಝೊಮ್ಮಿಡು.
the state of the mind, caused by excess joy, awe, fear, etc. characterised by light but continuous vibration of the body with the hairs being erect.
the sensation created in the body by uncomfortable coldness.
a painful feeling caused by cold or hot drink or eatable in the jaw where the tooth is or teeth are damaged.
the pain of a wound.
with weariness; with tired body or mind.
= ಝೊಟ್ಟಿಂಗ.
a mode or manner in playing percussion instruments.
a style - a) a particular kind, sort or type, as with reference to form, appearance or character;: b) a particular, distinctive or characteristic mode of action or manner of acting.
a striking or being struck with the fist, weapon.
the impact of a blow.
a stimulation of the nerves, muscles etc. caused by a stroke on a particular part of the body.
the condition of a limb being weakened in or deprived of the power of feeling or moving; numbness.
= ಝೊಮ್ಮಿಡು.
the quality that is characterised by intense force, speed, strong passion, impetuousness, etc.
the act of compelling; coercion; compulsion.
the act or quality of domineering.
the condition or quality of being more in number, quantity, intensity, etc. than usual or normal.
the act or fact of a thing being suspended as to dangle freely at one end.
an instance of being delayed; delay.
a state of equilibrium or equipoise; equal distribution of weight that enables a thing or person stand firmly in one's erect position.
the act of moving suddenly.
to lose one's balance while standing or walking in a waddling manner.
= ಝೋಲಿತಪ್ಪು.
a container made of a long cloth by joining and tying four corners together, that can be hanged on to one's shoulder.
similar one tied to a beam or roof of a house, used as a swinging cradle for children.
a small cloth pouch for keeping betel leaves and betel nuts.
the twenty-fourth letter of Kannaḍa alphabet and the tenth consonant having nasal pronunciation.
the nasal consonant 'ಞ '.
(gen. pronounced with the vowel 'ಅ') the twenty-fifth letter of Kannaḍa alphabet and the eleventh consonant.
a symbol for the number one.
a wedge-like tool with a cutting edge at the end of the blade, made of steel, used for cutting or shaping stone; a chisel.
a mould used for making monetary coins.
a tool used to punch palmyra leaves by driving it at one corner (for tying them together).
a making of coins by stamping; the act or process of minting money; mintage.
a stamped coin.
an officially designated place, building or room where monetary coins are minted.
an archaic tax levied on persons engaged in minting coins.
sodium borate, a white, anhydrous, crystalline salt (see ಟಂಕಣ).
the act of repairing vessels by hammering the portion where it is cracked, dented or broken.
the downward gradient of a hill or mountain.
a high or inordinate opinion of one's own dignity, importance, merit or superiority, whether as cherished in the mind or as displayed in bearing, conduct, etc.; pride; conceit.
cut or shaped with a chisel; chiselled.
a cut or the result of chiselling.

sodium borate, a white, anhydrous, crystalline salt with an alkaline taste, used as a flux in soldering metals and in the manufacture of glass, enamel, artificial gems, soaps, antiseptics, etc.; borax.
= ಟಂಕಣ.
= ಟಂಕಣ.
a making of coins by stamping; the act or process of minting money; mintage.
= ಟಂಕನ.
to make a heavy sound by pulling and releasing quickly the string of a bow.
to pull the string of a musical instrument and release quickly with jerking movement of a finger to produce a short sound.
a place where money is coined by authority of the government; a mint.
= ಟಂಕಶಾಲೆ.
an archaic tax levied on persons engaged in minting coins.
the sound produced by pulling and releasing quickly the string of a bow.
to cut or shape with a chisel; to chisel.
a brief staying somewhere on the way while travelling; a sojourn.
1.a stamped, monetary coin.
an archaic coin of the value of about one third of a rupee.
(phil.) the form of Srihari who is believed to be at the inner portion of the right thigh of humans.
= ಟಂಕಾರ.
= ಟಂಕಾರ.
a thick, usu. bottle-shaped club of metal, used as a weapon.
the joint of the leg that allows for movement between the femur and tibia and is protected by the patella; the central area of the leg between the thigh and the lower leg; the knee.
the strap of a horsṛs harness passing from the noseband to the girth between the forelegs, to keep the horse from rearing or throwing back its head: martingale.
a ring with a flat bottom hung by a strap, usu. on each side of a saddle and used as a footrest in mounting and while riding; a stirrup.
to make a sound by repeatedly striking a metal cup (as of the bell fixed to a bicyclṛs frame).
to set oneself against; to resist, argue against or be hostile to; to oppose.
to become excited; to be aroused by strong passions as joy, enthusiasm, etc.
to feel anxiety or apprehension about; to be afraid of; to fear.
to support as a prop.
to be crowded together; to be dense.
to cause to come to existence; to cause to happen, to bring forth; to give birth to.
to look grand, beautiful.
to tremble with or as with cold, fear, etc.; to shiver.
to undergo (something painful or unpleasant, as injury, grief, a loss, etc.); to be afflicted with; to suffer; to worry about.
= ಟಂಟಣಿಸು2.
a drinking glass with no handle or foot (formerly with a rounded bottom; a tumbler.
with a light clicking or tapping sound.
the condition of being amazed or bewildered.
with or as with eyes wide open, in surprise, wonder, interest, etc.
a small bar with tapered ends used for the same purpose in hand-spinning; a spindle.
to cheat; to deceive or trick.
the letter or the sound of 'ಟ'.
of the nature of cheating; tending to deceive (another or others).
a man who cheats; a cheat; a deceiver.
a man who steals, esp. secretly and without violence.
to treat contemptuously; to belittle; to slight.
the act of striking lightly and repeatedly in quick succession.
to defraud; to cheat; to deceive.
the act or an instance of deceiving; a deceiving or lying; deceit.
a pretending to be what one is not or to feel what one does not feel; esp., a pretense of virtue, piety, etc.
a misapprehension of the true state of affairs; the faulty perception of an external object.
an attraction or fascination exercised by a person, activity, quality, etc.
a drug that causes the mind misapprehend the true facts or physical objects or make behave submissively to other's instructions.
ಟಕ್ಕನಿಕ್ಕು ṭakkanikku to feed a drug that makes another person misapprehend the facts or obey one's instructions without thinking about; ಟಕ್ಕು ತಿನ್ನಿಸು ṭakku tinnisu (fig.) to deceive, cheat.
anxiety - a) the state of being anxious; b) concern about an imminent danger, difficulty, etc.
a fold in a garment made by sewing for purpose of shortening or decorating; a tuck.
the act, tendency or habit of cheating.
to cheat; to deceive or trick.
a deity; a god.
to wait in anxiety.
to make a fold in a garment to shorten or decorate; to tuck.
a pillow filled with feathers, air, foam rubber, etc. or a soft pad for sitting or kneeling on or reclining against; a cushion.
a piece of cloth or bunting, often attached to a staff, with distinctive colours, patterns or symbolic devices, used as a national or state symbol, as a signal, etc.; a banner.
a male sheep.
the plant Aeschynomene aspera of Papilionaceae family.
(jumping, leaping, attacking etc.) immediately; at once.
the letter or the sound of 'ಟ'.
= ಟನ್ನು.
a unit of various weights as a) 2,240 lb avoirdupois (1016.05 kg); long ton; b) 2,000 lb avoirdupois (907.19 kg); short ton; c) 1,000 kilograms (2,204.62 lb); metric ton.
a removable top cover (as of a container); a lid.
a removing the pyramidal portion (of grains) over and above the brim level of a container or measure, while measuring.
= ಟಪಾಲು.
post, mail - a) letters, papers, packages, etc. handled, transported, and delivered by the post office; b) letters, papers, etc. received or sent by a person, company, etc.
a bag or packet of letters, etc. to be transported by post.
a conveying of mail (as by the postal system).
a cart, vehicle carrying mail; a mail-cart.
a man whose work is carrying and delivering mail; a letter carrier; a postman.
= ಟಪ್ಪೆ.
ಟಪ್ಪಾ ಬಂಡಿ ṭappābaṇḍi = ಟಪ್ಪೆ ಬಂಡಿ; ಟಪ್ಪಾ ಕುದುರೆ ṭappākudure = ಟಪ್ಪೆ ಕುದುರೆ.
= ಟಪಾಲು.
an office of the department of the government which has charge of the conveyance of letters; a post office.
= ಟಪ್ಪಾಲುಕಚೇರಿ.
a pre-determined halting or brief sojourning place where the coach or carriage (usu. drawn by horses) are changed.
letters, packages, etc., that are sent or delivered by means of the postal system.

ಟಪ್ಪೆ ಓಟ ṭappe ōṭa a race between two or more teams, each runner going in turn only a part of the total distance; a relay-race; ಟಪ್ಪೆ ಕುದುರೆ ṭappe kudure a horse kept at a post house or inn, for couriers and post chaises or for hire to travellers; a post-horse; ಟಪ್ಪೆ ಬಂಡಿ ṭappe baṇḍi a coach or carriage drawn by horses, which were changed at each post; a post-chaise; ಟಪ್ಪೆಯ ಸವಾರ ṭappeya savāra a rider with a horse kept in readiness at each stage to relieve another and carry post, mail, parcel etc. brought from the latter further.
to stay and be in readiness at a pre-designated place to carry the parcel, burden further and to relieve the one who brought it so far.
to keep a horse, ox or coach ready at a pre-determined place or stage for carrying the passengers, parcels, burden etc. further.
the quality of domineering in a haughty manner; overbearingness; imperiousness.
ಟಬರು ನಡೆಸು tabaru naḍesu to act, behave in a overbearing or imperious manner; ಟಬರು ಮಾಡು tabaru māḍu to wield one's official power or use official position in an arrogant or domineering manner.
a large, open container of metal, stone, plastic etc. used for storing water, bathing, washing, etc.; a tub.
a small, hand-held percussion instrument with a leather membrane, played on with either hands or a stick. ಟಮಕಿ ಬಾರಿಸು ṭamaki bārisu to play ಟಮಕಿ.
(fig.) to spread information widely; ಟಮಕಿ ಸಾರು ṭamaki sāru = ಟಮಕಿ ಬಾರಿಸು - 2.
the act, practice or habit of deceiving; deception; trickery; fraud.
sweet sounding speech, words used to deceive others.

a ring or band of rubber, either solid or hollow placed over the rim of a wheel of a vehicle encasing a tube inflatable with air of specified pressure, that helps the vehicle to move smoothly; a tyre.
to make up one's mind or reach a decision, about; to determine; to decide.

any of a family (Meleagrididae) of large, gallinaceous North American birds with a small, naked head and spreading tail, including a wild or domesticated species (Meleagris gallopavo) bred as poultry, raised for its meat; turkey.
a thick cotton towel with a long nap composed of uncut loops; a Turkish towel.
the thick, fleshy, edible root of either of two plants of the mustard family, the white-fleshed Brassica rapa rapifera or the yellow-fleshed rutabaga.
the plant itself.
the coniferous tree Pinus palustris of Pinaceae family; turpentine tree.
the oleoresin derived from this tree; turpentine.
= ಟಳಾಯಿಸು.
the quality or condition of the eyes sparkling or face being radiant from joy, delight, satisfaction, bliss, etc.
to express one's joy, delight, satisfaction etc. with sparkling eyes or radiant face.
the science of numbers; arithmetic.
a deliberate false statement or an act made with intent to deceive.
the total mass; the total quantity of things in a heap.
an arrangement of sticks fastened together in middle so as to make the shape of 'X' when made to stand on the ground and used as a stand for a book being read.
to add (several numbers) up; to find the total of; to total up.
the third of the five sets of classified consonants in Kannaḍa consisting of 'ಟ್, ಠ್, ಡ್, ಢ್ & ಣ್'.
= ಟವಲು.
an absorbent cloth for wiping and drying the hands, face or body after washing or bathing; a towel.
lack of honesty; a disposition to lie, cheat or steal; deceiving; dishonesty.
a false statement made with deliberate intent to deceive; an intentional untruth; a falsehood; a lie.
the feeling, attitude or expression of disdaining; the feeling of contempt.
a man who habitually cheats another; a fraud or cheat.
= ಟಮಾಳ.
to cheat; to deceive or trick.
to fascinate; to charm; to enchant.
= ಟವಳಿ.
a protective covering for the head used by soldiers; a helmet.
a steel covering worn to protect the body against weapons; an armour.
sweet sounding speech, words used to deceive others.
a mark, seal, impression, etc. on a paper, usu. used as a symbol of authority giving permission, licence, etc.; stamp.
a pre-stamped official paper of a particular denomination, used in documenting the legal, commercial transactions; a stamp paper.
to make (a horse) walk hither and thither.
to walk to and fro; to move around.
a large container for storing liquid; a tank.
ಟಾಂಗನಿಕ್ಕು tānganikku = ಟಾಂಗುಕೊಡು.
a kind of two-wheeled passenger-cart drawn by a horse.
the man who drives a ಟಾಂಗಾ, a two-wheeled passenger-cart, drawn by a horse.
either of the two legs (of a human being); ಟಾಂಗುಕೊಡು tāngu koḍu to put one's leg across the direction of another's movement as to thwart or make that person fall down.
(fig.) to hinder, obstruct, another's progress, plans, etc.; to put a spoke in another's wheel.

the act or operation of making announcements in public, usu. over a wide area, by beating drums (to attract the attention of people); ಟಾಂಟಾಂ ಮಾಡು tām tām māḍu to spread information, gossip, etc. widely.
the fact of a sound or word ending with the consonant sound 'ಟ'.
a single complete in-and-out movement of the threaded needle in sewing; a stitch; ಟಾಕ ಹಾಕು tāka hāku to stitch ( a cloth or two pieces together).
a medium-sized, saddle-horse.
for or to suit the present situation (without general application); temporarily.
ಟಾಕಿ ಹರಿ tāki hari (one's courage, confidence) to be lost or to lose (its) original intensity; to become weak; ಟಾಕಿ ಹಾಕು tāki hāku = ಟಾಕ ಹಾಕು.
a wedge-like tool with a cutting edge at the end of the blade, made of steel, used for cutting or shaping stone, metal, etc.; a chisel.
a motion picture with accompanying synchronized speech, singing, etc.; a talking picture.
an instrument for writing or drawing with ink; a pen or pen-like instrument.
an old unit of weight.
= ಟಾಕೋಟಾಕು.
observing the appointed time; on time; punctually.
in a proper, neat manner; tidily.
a little piece of stiff wire with a pointed end and rounded head, for fastening papers together; a paper-pin.
that which is said in a clear and loud voice.
a place affording protection, as from the elements or danger; a shelter.
the main city in a district in which all or most of the administrative offices are located.
a division of an army guarding a strategic place, town, city, etc.
the quarters assigned to a troop or troops.
the local office of the police force in a town; a police station.
the office of local administration.
the toll-gate at the entrance of a town.
either of the two sticks placed below and above a loom on which the threads pass onto the loom.
a votive lamp fixed at a place.
a contingent of policemen, armed force, etc. guarding a place.
a place where tents, huts, barracks or other more or less temporary structures have been put up for soldiers.
a shifting of a camp (of soldiers) from one place to another.
= ಟಾಣದೀವಿಗೆ.
= ಟಾಣಯ.
a drug, medicine or other agent for restoring or increasing body tone or for invigorating, stimulating the natural functions of the body; a tonic.
to consume (as a food); to eat.
a large tract of land surrounded by water on all sides, and not large enough to be called a continent; an island.
an exiling of a person from the main land sending to an island, a punishment awarded in the days of British rule.
a neat orderly manner in appearance or an organised and systematic way a thing is or is to be done; rigid or exact rightness; tidiness.

any of various dark-coloured, viscid products with pungent odour obtained from the destructive distillation of certain organic substances, as coal, peat, shale or wood, used for protecting and preserving surfaces; tar.
(fig.) the pitch-black colour.
a place, an area.
= ಟವಲು.
= ಟವಲು.
= ಟವಳಿ.
to cheat; to deceive or trick.
to treat with contempt; to disdain; to look down.
a solution of alcohol or of alcohol and water, containing animal, vegetable or chemical drugs; tincture.
the clinking sound of bells.
(said of a particular kind of birds) to produce ಟಿಂವ್‍ sound; to chirp.
a kind of bird whose characteristic sound is ಟಿಂವ್‍.
a light clicking or tapping sound, as that made by the escapement of a watch or clock.
a small mark (usu. round in shape) made on the forehead or cheeks.
a small round piece of sparkling paper or other material used in decorating.
= ಟಿಕಳಿ.
to stay, sojourn (at a place) for relatively longer period.
= ಟಿಕಾಯಿಸು.
= ಟಿಕೆಟ್ಟು.
a slip, usu. of paper, serving as evidence that the holder has paid a fare or admission or is entitled to some service, right or the like; a ticket.
ಟಿಕೆಟ್ಟು ಕೊಡು ṭikeṭṭu koḍu (coll.) to send a person off (from a place) or sack (from service).
the plant Clematis triloba of Ranunculaceae family; a kind of hemp.
= ಟಿಕೆಟ್ಟು.
a contemptible, worthless thing.
to treat contemptuously; to belittle; to slight.
a spurious, counterfeit pearl or diamond.
= ಟಿಟ್ಟಿಭ.
any of a genus (Vanellus) of black-and-white plovers, esp., the crested Vanellus vanellus with broad, rounded wings, noted for spectacular aerial displays; the lapwing.
= ಟಿಟ್ಟಿಭ.
= ಟಿಟ್ಟಿಭ.

a soft, silver-white, crystalline, metallic chemical element, malleable at ordinary temperatures, capable of a high polish, and used as an alloy in tin foils, solders, utensils, type metals, superconducting magnets, etc. and in making tin plate; Tin; (Sn).
a thin sheet of iron or steel plated with tin; a tin plate.
a box made of tin plates.
to mix the playing cards.
= ಟಿಪಾಯಿಸು.
the musical voice or sound.
= ಟಿಪ್ಪಣಿ.
a note in explanation, criticism or illustration of something written or said; annotation.
a remark or observation made in criticism or as an expression of opinion; a comment.
a man who writes critical or explanatory notes for (a literary work, etc.); an annotator; a commentator.
to write a note, commentary, explanation on (a literary work).
= ಟಿಫಿನ್ನು.
a light meal; tiffin.
= ಟಿಫಿನ್ನು.
a particular kind of stitch .
to render a person, animal or thing weak or useless.
to inflict a wound or wounds.
to lose strength; to become very weak.
to have a strong dislike.
a kind of stitch in which each movement of the thread is separated by a relatively more distance.
the border on a garment or piece of cloth, usu. made by folding the edge and sewing it down.
the decorative lace-work on the upper garments of women.
a particular kind of hold or lock in wrestling .
a tiny spot or dot (usu. marked on a letter to represent the modified sound).
= ಟಿಸಿಲೊಡೆ.
any woody extension growing from the trunk or main stem or from a main limb, of a tree or shrub; a branch.

any part or extension of a main body or system - as a) a division or part of a body of learning; b) a division of a family descending from a common ancestor; c) a subdivision of a family of languages; d) a division or a separately located unit of an organisation; etc.
the place where a road separates itself and runs in two or more different directions.
the road at that point.
to put forth branches.
(fig.) to extend oneself in different directions or at different places.
the evergreen plant Thea sinensis (= Camelia thea, = C. sinensis) of Theaceae family.
its dried and prepared leaves used to make a beverage; tea.
the beverage made using these leaves.
= ಟಿಂಹಕ್ಕಿ .
a man who writes a critical explanation, interpretation or commentary of a text or portion of a text, a person skilled in exegesis; a exegete; a commentator.
one who judges disapprovingly; a fault-finder; a criticiser.

to analyse and judge as a critic; to evaluate.
to judge disapprovingly; to find fault with; to criticise; to censure.

a crescent-shaped ornament worn round the neck; a crescent necklace.
to write a note, commentary, explanation on (a literary work).

a note of comment or reference at the bottom of a page.
a group of people constituting one side in a contest or competition or a group of people working together in a coordinated effort; a team.

the fruit of this tree consisting of a thick, fibrous, brown, oval husk under which there is a thin, hard shell enclosing a layer of edible white meat, which has also filled with a sweet, milky fluid called coconut milk; coconut.
